album.name: Garden Shots
album.description: Just some photos taken in our back garden really. Nothing really exciting I'm afraid. Just playing with the Canon S20 and seeing what it's capable of/

image.caption: Pink geranium
image.description: Trying out the macro mode on the S20

image.caption: A wall tile
image.description: The people who owned the house before us left us a lot of plants, and also some tiles. This is one of them. Again just testing out the various modes on the S20.

image.caption: Black and white ducks...
image.description: Another thing we were left was a duck wind chime. This photo was taken at Gain +2 and then converted into black and white and has got a bit of a feeling of grain about it.
